description: Create a function that takes a string of DNA and matches each base with its pair, returning a nested array. In DNA, C pairs with G and T pairs with A.
Write a function that takes a number (n) and returns the square root of that number.

The function `fillSquare` should take an array of arrays and should complete these arrays so that they are a square matrix with the value `null` standing in for any blank positions. If extra sub-arrays are needed to complete the square, these should be added at the bottom of the matrix.
